name: GKComponent
desc: The abstract superclass for creating objects that add specific gameplay functionality to an entity.

items.name: func update(deltaTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Performs any custom periodic actions defined by the component subclass.

items.name: var entity: GKEntity?
items.desc: The entity that owns this component.

items.name: func didAddToEntity()
items.desc: Notifies the component that it has been assigned to an entity.

items.name: func willRemoveFromEntity()
items.desc: Notifies the component that it has been removed from an entity.
